metadata.title: Packer by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Packer helps you create golden images for multiple platforms from a single source configuration.

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Packer Integrations.

integrations.name: Salt
integrations.description: The Salt plugin enables users to apply Salt states to their Packer-built images for the purpose of further customizing them using Salt's powerful desired state automation.

integrations.name: External
integrations.description: The External plugin is able to communicate with external commands.

integrations.name: Anka
integrations.description: This is a packer plugin for building macOS VM templates and tags using the Anka Virtualization CLI

integrations.name: Kingsoft Cloud
integrations.description: The Kingsoft Cloud plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images on Ksyun.

integrations.name: KubeArmor
integrations.description: The KubeArmor plugin which provides kubearmor hardening security policies for the build workloads

integrations.name: Gridscale
integrations.description: Create new (os) templates for use with gridscale.

integrations.name: Kamatera
integrations.description: Build Kamatera cloud images and add them to the account's disk library.

integrations.name: Nutanix
integrations.description: A multi-component plugin can be used with Packer to create custom images.

integrations.name: Outscale
integrations.description: Use Packer to create Outscale OMIs.

integrations.name: incus
integrations.description: The incus plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create OCI images with incus.

integrations.name: Unikraft
integrations.description: The Unikraft plugin uses kraftkit to create and package runnable Unikraft unikernel images.

integrations.name: IPSW
integrations.description: The IPSW data source provides information about Apple IPSW releases based on the filter options provided in the configuration.

integrations.name: Scaleway
integrations.description: Create new images for use with Scaleway.

integrations.name: Mondoo
integrations.description: Scans Linux and Windows HashiCorp Packer builds for vulnerabilities and security misconfigurations.

integrations.name: Linode
integrations.description: Create Linode Images for use with Linode.

flags.name: HCP Ready
flags.description: This integration has been tested to work with HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP)

integrations.name: SSH Key
integrations.description: Datasource used to generate SSH keys.

integrations.name: Git
integrations.description: A plugin for Packer which provides access to git.

integrations.name: DigitalOcean
integrations.description: The DigitalOcean plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images for DigitalOcean.

integrations.name: Tart
integrations.description: Create macOS and Linux VMs for Apple Silicon powered by Tart virtualization.

integrations.name: UpCloud
integrations.description: A builder plugin for Packer which can be used to generate storage templates on UpCloud.

flags.name: HCP Ready
flags.description: This integration has been tested to work with HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP)

integrations.name: Yandex
integrations.description: The Yandex plugin is able to manage images for use with the Yandex Compute Cloud.

integrations.name: VMware vSphere
integrations.description: The vSphere plugin is able to create vSphere virtual machines for use with any VMware product.

flags.name: HCP Ready
flags.description: This integration has been tested to work with HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP)

integrations.name: VirtualBox
integrations.description: The VirtualBox plugin creates VirtualBox virtual machines and export them to an OVA or OVF format.

integrations.name: Triton
integrations.description: The Triton Packer builder is able to create new images for use with Triton.

flags.name: Archived
flags.description: This integration is no longer maintained

integrations.name: Tencent Cloud
integrations.description: The Tencent Cloud plugin provides the capability to build customized images based on an existing base images.

flags.name: Archived
flags.description: This integration is no longer maintained

integrations.name: QEMU
integrations.description: The Qemu Packer Plugin comes with a single builder able to create KVM virtual machine images.

integrations.name: Proxmox
integrations.description: The Proxmox Packer builder is able to create Proxmox virtual machines and store them as new Proxmox Virtual Machine images.

integrations.name: Profitbricks
integrations.description: The profitbricks plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images on IONOS Compute Engine.

flags.name: Archived
flags.description: This integration is no longer maintained

integrations.name: Parallels
integrations.description: The Parallels plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images on Parallels.

integrations.name: Naver Cloud
integrations.description: The Naver Cloud plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images on the Naver Cloud platform

integrations.name: LXD
integrations.description: The LXD plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create OCI images with LXD.

integrations.name: LXC
integrations.description: The LXC plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create OCI images with LXC.

integrations.name: JDCloud
integrations.description: The JDCloud plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images on JDCloud.

flags.name: Archived
flags.description: This integration is no longer maintained

integrations.name: Hyper-V
integrations.description: The Hyper-V plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images from Hyper-V.

integrations.name: HyperOne
integrations.description: The HyperOne plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images on HyperOne.

flags.name: Archived
flags.description: This integration is no longer maintained

integrations.name: Hetzner Cloud
integrations.description: The hcloud plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images on Hetzner Cloud.

integrations.name: HashiCups
integrations.description: The HashiCups plugin is a reference plugin for learning how to use HashiCorp Packer.

integrations.name: Google Cloud Platform
integrations.description: The googlecompute plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images on GCE.

flags.name: HCP Ready
flags.description: This integration has been tested to work with HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP)

integrations.name: Docker
integrations.description: The docker plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to manage containers with Docker.

flags.name: HCP Ready
flags.description: This integration has been tested to work with HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP)

integrations.name: CloudStack
integrations.description: The cloudstack plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images on Apache CloudStack.

integrations.name: Ansible
integrations.description: The Ansible plugin allows users to execute as a provisioner during a Packer build.

integrations.name: IONOS 1&1
integrations.description: The 1&1 Packer Plugin is able to create virtual machines for IONOS cloud.

integrations.name: OpenStack
integrations.description: The OpenStack multi-component plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images.

integrations.name: VMware
integrations.description: The Packer Plugin for VMware with to create virtual machine images for use with VMware products.

integrations.name: Vagrant
integrations.description: The Vagrant multi-component plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images.

integrations.name: Oracle
integrations.description: The Oracle multi-component plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images.

integrations.name: Alicloud
integrations.description: The Alicloud plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images on the Alibaba Cloud platform

integrations.name: Amazon
integrations.description: The Amazon plugin can be used with HashiCorp Packer to create custom images on AWS.

integrations.name: Azure
integrations.description: Packer can create Azure virtual machine images through variety of ways depending on the strategy that you want to use for building the images.
